dependsOn.description: A list of other defined services this service depends on, alters the order of service creation and where in the network bridge they appear.

adapter.description: Which adapter will this database connection use?

host.description: Optional hostname for this database connection. If not set, is inferred by the adapter.

password.description: Optional password for this database connection.

port.description: Optional port for this database connection. If not set, is inferred by the adapter.

username.description: Optional username for this database connection. If not set, is inferred by the adapter.
